articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The message extended warm congratulations and comradely greetings to the president and, through him, to the friendly party, government and people of Laos on the occasion of the 42nd birthday of LPDR.
					
					 Over the past 42 years, the Lao government and people have achieved great successes in the work to defend the socialist ideology, consolidate the people's democratic system and improve the people's living standard under the correct leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, it said.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and the two countries provided by the preceding leaders would steadily develop thanks to the common concern and efforts, it heartily wished the president good health and happiness and greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Lao Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Thong Loun Sisoulith, prime minister of Laos, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The message noted that the Lao government and people have achieved big successes in the work to further consolidate the people's democratic system and carry out the eighth five-year plan of social economic development under the leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily strengthen in conformity with the desire of their peoples, the message wished the prime minister greater success in his work.
					
					 On the same day, Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to his Lao counterpart Saleumxay Kommasith.

articles.title: FM Spokesman on Planned Joint Aerial Drill by U.S. and S. Korea
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on Planned Joint Aerial Drill by U.S. and S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Saturday made public the following statement:
					 The U.S. is planning to carry out the largest-ever joint aerial drill with its south Korean stooges targeting the DPRK from December 4 to 8 and push the current touch-and-go situation of the Korean peninsula to a flare-up.
					
					 More than 230 fighters from the U.S. air force bases in Japan and south Korea including its latest stealth fighters F-22 Raptor and F-35, the U.S. major strategic assets as well as some 12,000 U.S. troops are to participate in the said drill.
					
					 The drill would be unprecedented in its size and nature of simulating actual combat situation as well as in the number of the U.S. major strategic assets including F-22 Raptor and F-35 stealth fighters to be involved.
					
					 The U.S. is publicly touting the objective of the drill as enhancing the actual combat capability to disable the DPRK's major strategic bases in the early stages of war.
					
					 It has just wound up the large-scale nuclear war drill against the DPRK that involved three nuclear powered aircraft carrier strike groups, and they are prompting the speculation that the U.S. nuclear attack on the DPRK is a possible scenario.
					
					 The Trump team is begging for nuclear war by staging an extremely dangerous nuclear gamble on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The international community terms the moves of the U.S. very alarming and is keeping a close watch on them with great concern and anxiety as the U.S. is engrossed in making successive military provocations mobilizing greater amount of its nuclear strategic assets than ever, thereby driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of crisis.
					
					 The facts above evidently show who is the real nuclear war maniac and the "nuclear demon" that disrupts and destroys peace of the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					 The moves of the U.S. to "demonize" the DPRK while condemning its legitimate and righteous measures to strengthen the self-defensive nuclear deterrence as a threat to global peace and security can be regarded as a prelude to nuclear war since these moves are geared to forge a pretext for nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 As stipulated in the Decree of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on further consolidating the status of a self-defensive nuclear weapons state, the mission of the state nuclear force of the DPRK is to deter and repel the U.S. invasion and attack against the country, and carry out crushing retaliatory strikes on the bases of aggression.
					
					 The latest developments clearly prove once again that peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world can be maintained only when an effective balance of force is established between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The international community should identify who is begging and heading for nuclear war and hold the U.S. totally accountable as the destroyer and disruptor of global peace.
					
					 Should the Korean peninsula and the world be embroiled in the crucible of nuclear war because of the reckless nuclear war mania of the U.S., the U.S. will have to accept full responsibility for it.

articles.title: Speech of DPRK Delegation Head at UNIDO General Conference
articles.content:
Speech of DPRK Delegation Head at UNIDO General Conference
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The head of the delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea made a speech at the 17th session of the General Conference of the United Nations Industrial Development Organization (UNIDO) held in Vienna, Austria on Nov. 28.
					 He said that not a few practices of economic inequality, unemployment and poverty still remain in the world and they arise as a very dangerous social problem among developing countries being pushed out of the "globalization" whose process has become deepened.
					
					 Some specified countries violate the sovereignty and rights to development of developing countries incurring their displeasure and block their socio-economic development with sanctions and pressure, he noted, adding:
					
					 The present situation on the Korean peninsula is a typical example.
					
					 The hostile forces disregard the legitimate step for self-defence of a sovereign state and impose the harshest and inhumane sanctions upon its civilian industry and people's living under the pretence of implementing "sanctions resolution" of the UN Security Council.
					
					 Such indiscriminate sanctions and economic blockade should be no longer allowed as they are threatening the vital rights of an individual country and laying artificial hurdles in the way for sound and sustained development of the region.
					
					 All the facts more urgently require the UNIDO to create circumstances and conditions favorable for guaranteeing the inclusive and sustained industrial development of developing countries and serve as a practical companion able to fully satisfy the member nations' needs for development.
					
					 Now the Korean people, under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, are bravely tiding over all the challenges on the way of advance for building a rich and powerful nation and working unprecedented miracles in the struggle to implement the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, the head of the delegation said, and went on:
					
					 It is the constant stand of the DPRK government to provide the people with the most plentiful and civilized life by giving definite priority to science and technology and enlisting the potentials of the independent economy to the maximum.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever strengthen the relations of friendship and cooperation with the UNIDO and all its member nations, in conformity with its foreign policy based on independence, peace and friendship, and actively join in the international efforts for development and prosperity common to mankind.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Central Court Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Central Court Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Court of the DPRK led by President Kang Yun Sok left here Saturday to visit Russia.

articles.title: Army-People Gathering Held to Celebrate Test-fire of Hwasong-15
articles.content:
Army-People Gathering Held to Celebrate Test-fire of Hwasong-15
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- An army-people gathering took place here on Friday to celebrate the great victory with which the DPRK successfully accomplished the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power, under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the SAC of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials of institutions at all levels and industrial establishments and working citizens and youth and students in the city.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju read out the statement of the DPRK government.
					
					 Celebration speeches were made by Pak Kwang Ho, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the C.C. WPK, Army General Pak Yong Sik, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					
					 The speakers said that the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 put the strategic position of the DPRK on the highest level and fully displayed the invincible spirit of socialist Korea.
					
					 They extended the highest glory and deep gratitude in reflection of all the Party members, servicepersons and civilians to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who opened the royal road for the building of a powerful socialist nation by successfully realizing the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 They also expressed heartfelt congratulations to the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of defense science who implemented the decision made at the 2nd plenary meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the WPK and most faithfully and perfectly carried into practice the Party's plan for building a strategic nuclear force.
					
					 They stressed that all the officials, Party members and working people should turn out as one in the death-defying struggle for the Party, the revolution, the country and the people, like the combatants in the field of defense science, so as to make leaping progress and innovations on all the fronts for building an economic power and a highly-civilized power and improving the people's standard of living and thus conclude this significant year, full of grand national events, with brilliant achievements.
					
					 At the end of the gathering, fireworks were displayed in celebration of the successful test-fire of Hwasong-15.

articles.title: Offshore Farm Newly Built in Sokda Area
articles.content:
Offshore Farm Newly Built in Sokda Area
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- An offshore farm was newly built in Sokda area, Jungsan County, South Phyongan Province of the DPRK.
					 The farm will breed jellyfish and lobster in seawater and bivalve like razor shell in sea mud.
					
					 This mixed cultivation enables the farm to have comprehensive and effective use of limited breeding area and increase the production by improving the self-purification capability.
					
					 Several floodgates for intake and drainage were set up in different parts of the farm for smooth circulation of seawater.
					
					 After releasing a large number of breed razor shells, jellyfishes and lobsters into the breeding area, the county takes good care of it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Challenge to Struggle against Evils
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Challenge to Struggle against Evils
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The political situation in south Korea has fallen into a mayhem of confusion and the people have faced a great obstacle in their struggle to have the deep-seated evils eradicated because of the desperate challenges by the conservatives.
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article Saturday that the moves of the conservatives to prevent the struggle of eradicating the deep-seated evils are nothing but a vicious challenge to the south Koreans from all walks of life desirous of new politics and life and to the candlelight actions.
					
					 Their desperate challenge to the ardent desire and demand of the public clearly shows again the unchangeable, unpopular nature of the group of traitors who looked down upon the people and regarded them as an object of dictatorship.
					
					 It is also a revelation of the black-hearted intention to revive the conservative regime and turn the clock of history back to the past era of dictatorship.
					
					 As the campaign for eradicating the deep-seated evils gained momentum, the conservative group is now working hard to unite the conservative forces, crying out for "revamping conservatism".
					
					 Such ruckus is a sinister political conspiracy of the conservatives aimed to prevent the people's struggle for eradicating evils and come to power again.
					
					 The above-said moves for revival of the conservative regime should never be tolerated as they are a vicious challenge to the public demand for new politics and life.
					
					 The revival of the conservative regime precisely means the revival of the bloody fascist dictatorship, which will bring the south Koreans untold misfortune and disasters.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Meeting of SOFA Joint Committee
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Meeting of SOFA Joint Committee
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Lately there was a meeting of the joint committee of the "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) at which the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces discussed the issues of disclosure of the contents of the agreement, reparation to the victims of crimes committed by GIs, de-pollution of U.S. military bases in south Korea, etc. to calm down anti-American feelings of the south Korean people.
					 At the meeting the U.S. suggested that only information excluding "military secrets" would be made public when discussing the issue of disclosure of contents of the agreement, and it is a virtual refusal. The U.S. turned down the issue of increasing the number of the victims who deserve reparation, talking such nonsense as "preventive effort against GI crimes" and "boosting the bilateral cooperation". It also rejected the issue of sharing burden for de-pollution of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' bases in south Korea, calling for continuing the "constructive discussion". Finally the south Korean puppet authorities got nothing but inhospitality and ignorance, Rodong Sinmun says Saturday in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary continues:
					
					 The above-said meeting is nothing but an epitome of disgraceful relations between the master and servant as it ran through with domination and subordination, coercion and humiliation.
					
					 As already disclosed, SOFA concluded between south Korea and the U.S. is the worst document of modern slavery in the world.
					
					 That's why the U.S. shamelessly satisfied its brigandish needs at the meeting, refusing to meet south Korea's demands at all.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to feel shame. They, obsessed with pro-U.S. sycophancy and confrontation with compatriots, kept mum before the master while reading its face. Their disgraceful behavior fans up the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices.
					
					 They should not run amuck in the moves for confrontation with the compatriots, begging for the permanent U.S. military presence in south Korea with dependence on the "alliance" with the master, but bear in mind the demand of the candlelight demonstrators for independence against the U.S.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Snipes at Japan's Arms Buildup
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Snipes at Japan's Arms Buildup
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Japan is working hard to secure the capability for a "preemptive" attack on the DPRK.
					 Prime Minister Abe at a meeting of the Upper House on Nov. 22 said "it is necessary to positively consider the access to the capability for a preemptive attack on enemy bases" in order to protect the lives of the people and peace from "missile attack by north Korea."
					
					 Earlier, Defense Minister Onodera said Japan is considering the access to the capability for attacking overseas missile bases. The lawmakers who participated in a meeting sponsored by the supra-partisan lawmakers' league asserted "it is important to strike the base of north Korea just before missile launch", underlining the "need to discuss the Self-Defense Forces' access to the capability for mounting an attack on enemy bases."
					
					 Such moves of the Abe regime are very risky ones that only increase tensions in the region and pose a grave threat to peace in Asia and the world.
					
					 Japan has been crazy about the moves for emerging a military giant since its defeat. But it has never openly talked about "preemptive attack" and "overseas aggression" like now.
					
					 SDF's operation sphere had been confined to Japan's territorial air and sea. But such military strategy underwent a change long ago under the strategy of "the exclusive defense".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, regarding the "war on terrorism" launched by the U.S. in the 21st century as a golden chance for realizing its wild ambition for reinvasion, projected it as a flagship of its security policy to "counter the threat of terrorism" and shaped an offensive military strategy. According to the modified "Japan-U.S. Defense Cooperation Guidelines," SDF's operation sphere covers the whole world.
					
					 The Abe cult has gone beyond the red line in its militarist moves to realize the wild scheme for reinvading Korea and the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere." It is now trying to carry them out in practice.
					
					 Actually, the Japanese reactionaries are pushing ahead with the project for developing and acquiring equipment for increasing its attack capabilities, as evidenced by its development of Tomahawk cruise missiles capable of striking ground targets from escort ships.
					
					 The Japan Defense Ministry recently decided to push ahead with the plan for adding the capability for striking ground targets to its anti-ship cruise missiles whose development will start next year and to allot the budget of 7.7 billion yen to the manufacture of a trial product until 2022.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the Japanese reactionaries are busy spreading the story about "threat from north Korea" at home and abroad in a bid to create an atmosphere for supporting its access to the capability for preemptive attack.
					
					 It is their ill design to reform the SDF in an offensive formation and modify the Constitution by inciting hostility toward the DPRK and hyping "security crisis" throughout the Japanese society under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean nation and the international community are closely watching the reckless military moves of Japan to seek its own interests by playing a flagship role in carrying out the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 Its crazy drive of militarist chariot with the backing of the U.S. will only plunge it into an abyss of ruin.

articles.title: S. Korea: Release of Participants in Struggle against Import of American Beef Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Release of Participants in Struggle against Import of American Beef Urged
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Those concerned of the civic organization in south Korea, which sponsored the candlelight action against the import of American beef in 2008, called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 29, urging the authorities to give special amnesty to the imprisoned action participants, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The speakers said that they should be granted special amnesty as they opposed the import of American beef posing a serious threat to the people's life and health and the de-nationalization of public sectors.

articles.title: Serious Environmental Pollution of U.S. Military Base in S. Korea
articles.content:
Serious Environmental Pollution of U.S. Military Base in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities made public the situation of environmental pollution of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan on Nov. 29, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					Civic and environmental organizations of south Korea, including the Green Federation, had contended that the situation of pollution of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan is serious, calling for survey on the base.
					
					According to the survey results, the base is seriously polluted by harmful substances.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmakers Call for Abrogating "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmakers Call for Abrogating "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Nineteen lawmakers of south Korea issued a joint resolution urging the abrogation of the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the re-negotiation on the issue Nov. 29, according to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News.
					 They said that the "agreement" is a humiliating one in which the Park Geun Hye regime evaded the duty of ensuring the dignity and rights of the victims of sexual slavery.
					
					 The "agreement" is invalid as it was made without reflection of the victims' opinion, they said.
					
					 They urged the authorities to immediately declare the abrogation of the "agreement" and start the re-negotiation with Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Kuwait on Nov. 23.
					 Javid Ahmad, director of the Administrative Department of the Kuwait Times who doubles as chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 23 to Dec. 17 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il through media and hold political and cultural events such as remembrance meeting, seminar and film show in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 24.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia and chairman of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 24 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Slovakia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Slovakia
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A Slovak committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Bratislava on Nov. 25.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting and Studying the Juche Idea and chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Switzerland on Nov. 26.
					 Massimiliano Ay, general secretary of the Communist Party of Switzerland, was elected chairperson of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee fixed a remembrance period from Dec. 1 to 18 and decided to hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and a seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's works in the period to commemorate the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-15 Hailed in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Test-fire of Hwasong-15 Hailed in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan issued a statement on Nov. 29 in celebration of the DPRK's successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the DPRK on its successful test-fire of the new-type ICBM Hwasong-15.
					
					 We hope that the DPRK would continue to make big successes under the guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un, the great son of the Korean people.
					
					 We are pleased to see the DPRK's success and regard it as pride.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente laosiano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente laosiano
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 42o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, quisiera enviar a Vd. mis cordiales felicitaciones y saludo camaraderil que hago extensivos al partido, gobierno y pueblo amistosos de su pais.
					
					Durante 42 anos pasados, el gobierno y el pueblo de Laos lograron grandes exitos, bajo la acertada direccion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, en la empresa para mantener el ideal socialista, consolidar el regimen democratico popular y mejorar los niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y paises, preparadas por los lideres antecesores, continuaran desarrollandose sin parar gracias a la atencion y esfuerzos conjuntos, deseo de todo corazon la buena salud y felicidad de Vd. y los exitos mas grandes en sus responsabilidades por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia el ejercicio aereo conjunto EE.UU.-Sudcorea
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia el ejercicio aereo conjunto EE.UU.-Sudcorea
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion que sigue:
					EE.UU. trata de llevar al umbral del estallido de guerra la actual situacion aguda de la Peninsula Coreana al librar del 4 al 8 de este mes junto con los titeres surcoreanos el entrenamiento aereo de gran envergadura contra la RPDC.
					
					En este simulacro se movilizaran mas de 230 aviones de combate procedentes de las bases aereas de Japon y Sur de Corea, inclusive el caza Stealth F-22 Raptor de version ultramoderna y F-35 que son principales propiedades estrategicas norteamericanas, y mas de 12 mil efectivos norteamericanos.
					
					Es la primera vez que EE.UU. desarrollara con muchos aviones F-22 Raptor y el F-35 el entrenamiento aereo conjunto simulando la batalla real en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. anuncia abiertamente que el objetivo del presente ejercicio esta en adiestrar la capacidad de batalla real para neutralizar en el periodo inicial de la guerra los principales blancos estrategicos de la RPDC.
					
					Hace unos dias, EE.UU. habia ejecutado el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura contra la RPDC en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana movilizando las 3 flotillas de portaaviones nucleares. Y ultimamente, divulga las opiniones de que es posible realmente el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora, los compinches de Trump estan buscando la guerra nuclear mediante el peligroso sorteo nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La sociedad internacional califica de un movimiento extraordinario y observa con gran preocupacion e inquietud el proceder de EE.UU. que perpetra incesantemente los actos provocativos militares movilizando las propiedades estrategicas nucleares de gran tamano y lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al estado tan tirante.
					
					Todos los hechos arriba mencionados muestran claramente quien es el verdadero maniaco de guerra nuclear que perturba y destruye la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.
					
					EE.UU. "sataniza" a la RPDC calificando de amenaza a la paz y la seguridad del mundo las medidas justas de esta por fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo, lo cual parte del objeto de preparar el pretexto del ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC y significa el preludio de la guerra nuclear.
					
					Como fue aclarado en el decreto de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC sobre el reforzamiento de la posicion del pais poseedor de armas nucleares de caracter autodefensivo, la mision de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de nuestro Estado reside en detener y rechazar la agresion y el ataque de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y asestar el fuerte golpe de represalia contra las bases principales de la agresion.
					
					La realidad vuelve a mostrar claramente que podemos defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo solo cuando logremos el equilibrio real de las fuerzas con EE.UU.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe distinguir correctamente de donde suena el tambor de la guerra nuclear y exigir la total responsabilidad a EE.UU., perturbador y destructor de la paz de la peninsula y el resto del mundo.
					
					Si esta peninsula y todo el mundo sean arrastrados por la guerra nuclear debido a la furia imprudente de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., este debera asumir toda su responsabilidad.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana pronuncia discurso en reunion de la ONU
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana pronuncia discurso en reunion de la ONU
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El jefe de la delegacion coreana hizo uso de la palabra en la 17a reunion de la asamblea general de la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo Industrial, efectuada el 28 de noviembre en Viena, Austria.
					Hoy dia, persisten todavia en el mundo la desigualdad economica, el desempleo y la pobreza que constituyen un problema social muy peligroso para los paises en vias de desarrollo que se quedan marginados en el transcurso de la "globalizacion", comenzo el y prosiguio:
					
					En la realidad de hoy, algunos Estados especificos violan la soberania y el derecho al desarrollo de los paises en vias de desarrollo, que no les gustan, y frenan el desarrollo socioeconomico de ellos mediante la sancion y presion.
					
					Un ejemplo tipico es la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Despreciando las justas medidas de autodefensa de nuestro Estado soberano, las fuerzas hostiles imponen la sancion mas salvaje y de lesa humanidad sobre las industrias civiles y hasta los sectores relacionados con la vida del pueblo, bajo el pretexto de la implementacion de las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					No se debe tolerar mas la sancion indiscriminada y el bloqueo economico que amenazan el derecho a sobrevivir de un pais y crea obstaculos artificiales ante el desarrollo sano y sostenible de la region.
					
					Todos los hechos urgen que la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo Industrial prepare el ambiente y condiciones favorables a asegurar el desarrollo de la industria global y sostenible de los paises en vias de desarrollo y se haga el socio real que satisfaga las demandas de desarrollo de los paises miembros.
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano esta creando los milagros sin precedentes en su campana para el cumplimiento de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, presentada por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, superando con valentia, bajo la sabia orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, todos los desafios surgidos en el curso de construccion de una patria prospera.
					
					Asegurar al pueblo la vida mas rica y civilizada al anteponer las ciencias y tecnicas y hacer uso de todas las potencialidades de la economia autarquica deviene la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					En el futuro tambien, la RPDC desarrollara aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con esta organizacion de la ONU y sus miembros conforme al ideal de su politica exterior basada en la independencia, la paz y la amistad y se incorporara activamente a los esfuerzos internacionales por el desarrollo y prosperidad comunes de la humanidad.

articles.title: Pyongyaneses felicitan exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Pyongyaneses felicitan exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en esta capital el mitin conjunto de militares y civiles para festejar la gran victoria de que bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea se llevo a feliz termino la gran causa historica de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, la de conversion del pais en la potencia coheteril.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, y otros cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y los funcionarios y trabajadores de los organos, fabricas y empresas a todos los niveles y los jovenes y estudiantes de esta capital.
					
					Pak Pong Ju dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Y hubo discursos de felicitaciones de Pak Kwang Ho, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente, del CC del PTC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de la RPDC, y Pak Chol Min, primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM "Hwasong-15" de nuevo tipo puso en maxima altura la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y demostro a todo el mundo el temperamento invicto de la Corea socialista.
					
					En reflejo del alma de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes coreanos, dieron maxima gloria y agradecimiento infinito al Maximo Dirigente quien abrio el ancho camino hacia la construccion de la potencia socialista al lograr con exito la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Tambien, enviaron la ferviente felicitacion a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de la rama de ciencias de defensa nacional materializaron a ultranza resolucion del 2o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del PTC y realizaron mas fielmente y perfectamente el proyecto estrategico del PTC.
					
					Como lo hicieron los trabajadores del dominio de ciencias de defensa nacional, todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha decisiva por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo y lograr los saltos e innovaciones en todos los sectores por la construccion de la potencia economica y civilizada y la mejora de la vida popular para asi finalizar exitosamente este ano significativo lleno de grandes eventos nacionales, enfatizaron. 
					
					Terminado el acto, fueron disparados los fuegos artificiales para celebrar el fulminante exito del lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM "Hwasong-15".
